edu.biu.scapi.interactiveMidProtocols.sigmaProtocol.cramerShoupEncryptedValue

Class SigmaCramerShoupEncryptedValueCommonInput

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.biu.scapi.interactiveMidProtocols.sigmaProtocol.cramerShoupEncryptedValue.SigmaCramerShoupEncryptedValueCommonInput
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SigmaCommonInput, ZKCommonInput, java.io.Serializable

    public class SigmaCramerShoupEncryptedValueCommonInput
extends java.lang.Object
implements SigmaCommonInput
    Concrete implementation of SigmaProtocol input, used by the SigmaCramerShoupEncryptedValue verifier and simulator.

    In SigmaCramerShoupEncryptedValue protocol, the common input contains a GroupElement x, a CramerShoup public key and the ciphertext of x using the CramerShoup encryption scheme.

    Author:
    Cryptography and Computer Security Research Group Department of Computer Science Bar-Ilan University (Moriya Farbstein)
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
